name: Treasure Hunter Blackbeard
text: You can send 1 "Treasure" Spell/Trap card from your Deck to your GY to Special Summon this card from your hand. You can target up to 3 "Treasure" cards in your GY: shuffle them back into the deck; draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Treasure Hunter Blackbeard" once per turn.
